name: SlimeVenture (FaKtory Games)
description:
This is a simple game I made for the Trijam #59: If you don't hear it, it doesn't exist.

Goal:

You are a slime that is constantly searching for music, and you must follow a music source in order to exist. By getting away from this source, you slowly fade out until you die. 

You can catch gems to have superpower : Purple Gem let you double jump and green gem let you infinite jump for two seconds.

Controls:

-WASD or Arrow keys: move and Jump

-SpaceBar: Jump

-Down Arrow, S key or Shift: Activate Green Gem power up (Unlimited Jumps)
